update t_cust_update_service_water
old_cust_service_id = #{oldCustServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT TT.PID, TT.new_cust_service_id, TT.old_cust_service_id, (SELECT tsu.`name` FROM t_sys_user tsu WHERE tsu.PID = TT.new_cust_service_id) create_user, TT.create_time, TT.upd_ser_wat_desc FROM t_cust_update_service_water TT WHERE TT.customer_id= #{cusUpdateServiceWater.pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY TT.create_time DESC
